name: Gondola Ride
description:
More of a car ride simulation than a proper game. You go on a procedurally generated car ride with a gondola. There are a couple of easter eggs to find along the way and you can add your own custom soundtrack to listen to on your ride.

This project was inspired by this video:

Finally, as always, if you run into any issues, let me know down in the comments and I'll do my best to fix them.
